hero.title: Your Business Universe in Your Pocket
hero.description: Harness the power of Kozmos to transform your mobile device into your business command center, anywhere in the world.

mobile.heroTitle: Unleash Your Business Potential, Anywhere, Anytime
mobile.heroDescription: Transform your mobile device into a powerful business command center. The Wix app puts your entire operation at your fingertips, empowering you to build, manage, and grow without boundaries.

section1.title: Your Website's Command Center in Your Pocket
section1.description: Experience the freedom of managing your digital presence from anywhere. With powerful mobile tools at your disposal, your website becomes a dynamic asset that evolves with your visionâ€”no desk required.
features: Access comprehensive dashboard controls to fine-tune your website on the move
Craft compelling social media content that amplifies your brand's voice and reach
Orchestrate targeted email campaigns that transform casual visitors into loyal customers

section2.title: Cultivate Meaningful Customer Connections, Instantly
section2.description: In today's rapid business landscape, responsiveness is everything. Transform fleeting interactions into lasting relationships with communication tools designed for the modern entrepreneur.
features: Engage in seamless conversations with customers through intuitive live chat functionality
Orchestrate your communications with an intelligent inbox that prioritizes what matters most
Build customer loyalty through consistent, thoughtful engagement that resonates

section3.title: Illuminate Your Business Performance with Real-Time Insights
section3.description: Data becomes your strategic advantage when it's accessible anywhere. Gain crystal-clear visibility into your business operations with powerful mobile analytics that reveal opportunities others might miss.
features: Monitor vital business metrics through an intuitive dashboard that tells your success story at a glance
Decode visitor journeys and conversion patterns to refine your customer experience strategy
Generate comprehensive performance reports with a few simple taps, perfect for meetings on the go

section4.title: Seamless Order Fulfillment from Palm to Doorstep
section4.description: Transform your supply chain into a competitive advantage with mobile inventory management that ensures you're always one step ahead. Keep your promises to customers with precision that builds trust and loyalty.
features: Orchestrate your entire fulfillment process with the tap of a finger, no matter where you are
Stay informed with instant alerts that keep you connected to your business's pulse
Provide customers with transparency through real-time shipping updates they can trust

section5.title: Orchestrate Your Schedule with Elegant Precision
section5.description: Time is your most precious resource. Our mobile scheduling system transforms chaotic calendars into harmonious symphonies of productivity, helping you maximize every moment while delighting your clients.
features: Take command of your professional schedule with intuitive calendar management that adapts to your rhythm
Eliminate costly no-shows with automated reminders that respect both your time and your clients'
Empower clients with self-service booking that feels personal and attentive

section6.title: Cultivate a Thriving Digital Community
section6.description: In the digital age, community is currency. Build a vibrant ecosystem around your brand that fosters loyalty, sparks conversation, and creates advocates who amplify your message organically.
features: Design and nurture membership experiences that transform casual customers into brand ambassadors
Foster genuine connections through moderated discussions that build community cohesion
Craft exclusive content journeys that reward your most dedicated followers

section7.title: Frictionless Financial Transactions, Anywhere
section7.description: Convert opportunities into revenue without missing a beat. Our mobile payment solutions eliminate geographical boundaries, allowing you to close deals with professional finesse whether you're in the office or across the globe.
features: Transform your mobile device into a sophisticated point-of-sale system that inspires customer confidence
Create polished financial documentation instantly, elevating your brand's professional image
Gain profound visibility into your financial ecosystem with detailed analytics that inform strategic decisions

AIPage.helpwith?: Explore the Concept of AI Agent

hero.title: AI Agents: A Conceptual Framework
hero.subtitle: The concept and potential of AI Agents that independently perform complex tasks, learn, and transform business processes.
hero.userQuery: Explain the process and key takeaways of analyzing last month's sales report.
hero.agentResponse: The Agent processes the data using 'data analysis' and 'summarization' tools. A 12% increase was observed in last month's sales data, while the reasons for the 15% decrease in region Y data should be investigated.
hero.headline1: The role of AI agents in content, research, and strategy
hero.desc1: The ability to process information and derive results instantly â€” initiating the implementation process.
hero.desc2: Modular integration approaches for quick setup and immediate use, without requiring software development.
hero.headline3: Mechanism for closing the skill gap with artificial intelligence
hero.desc3: Implementation of smart solutions for all information and research needs, from SEO content production to market analysis.
hero.headline4: The structure of intelligent agents operating 24/7 non-stop
hero.desc4: Autonomous agent architecture providing uninterrupted task cycles and continuous productivity.
hero.desc5: Technical foundations of AI solutions that comply with corporate security protocols and prioritize privacy.

whatIs.title: Definition of AI Agent
whatIs.subtitle: AI agents are conceptual descriptions of intelligent software systems that can perform complex tasks independently, learn from your data, and automate your business operations.
whatIs.point1: AI agents are advanced software solutions that utilize natural language processing, machine learning, and AI technologies to enhance your business's efficiency.
whatIs.point2: Their integration into existing systems is based on the principle of interacting with databases and workflows to make real-time decisions.
whatIs.point3: They can automate tasks across various fields, including customer service, sales, marketing, and operational processes.
whatIs.point4: They learn and adapt to your business's unique needs over time, providing continuously improving performance and results.

intelligence.title: Advanced Artificial Intelligence Mechanism
intelligence.description: At the core of Agents lie the latest natural language processing and machine learning technologies; the ability to solve complex problems and learn over time stems from this mechanism.

howWorks.title: How Do AI Agents Work?
howWorks.subtitle: Discover the power of AI agents and how they transform workflows.

step1.title: Memory
step1.description: The agent is generally equipped with short-term, long-term, consensus, and episodic memory. The agent can maintain context, learn from experience, and adapt to new situations by recalling past interactions, thereby improving performance.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Tools are functions or external resources that an agent can use to interact with its environment and enhance its capabilities. This allows them to execute complex tasks.

step3.title: Model (LLM)
step3.description: Large Language Models (LLMs) serve as the foundation for building AI agents, providing them with the ability to understand, reason, and act. LLMs function as an agent's 'brain'.

persona.title: Persona
persona.description: A well-defined persona ensures that an agent has a consistent character and acts in a manner appropriate to its assigned role.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Information About AI Agents
faq.subtitle: What you need to know about the technical infrastructure of AI agents and how they can transform workflows.

left.q1: Which languages do AI agents support?
left.a1: AI agents have the capability to support many languages, including Turkish, English, German, French, Spanish, and many more. Multi-language support is crucial for global use.
left.q2: Is technical knowledge required to use AI agents?
left.a2: User-friendly interfaces demonstrate how AI agents are used without requiring technical knowledge. Understanding basic AI principles enhances efficiency.
left.q3: How do AI agents protect private data?
left.a3: Full compliance with regulations like KVKK and GDPR is ensured by implementing the highest level of security protocols (encryption, secure storage).
left.a4: Yes, AI agents learn and adapt over time using machine learning technology. This allows the system to become increasingly smarter.

right.q1: In which sectors can AI agents be used?
right.a1: Agents can be adapted to many sectors, including retail, finance, healthcare, education, manufacturing, and more. Sector-specific optimization can be performed.
right.q2: What is the principle of customized solutions for companies?
right.a2: The modular structure of AI agents can be customized to meet the unique needs of every business. This allows for the design of the most suitable solution.

chat.title: Empower Your Website with a Smart Chatbot
chat.userQuestion: How can I integrate AI into my website?
chat.demoSubtitle: Experience the power of AI in a live demonstration.
chat.userQuestion1: Hi, I'm looking for a chatbot solution for my website. How can you help me?
chat.aiResponse1: Of course! We develop smart, 24/7 chatbots tailored to your business needs. We can automate customer support and increase your sales.
chat.userQuestion2: Great! Can it be integrated with our existing systems, for example, our CRM?
chat.aiResponse2: Absolutely. We seamlessly integrate our chatbots with your CRM, ERP, and any other API services you use, enabling them to generate data-driven, intelligent responses.

section1.title: Swift Development
section1.content: Building simple and functional iOS applications while improving my Swift skills.

section2.title: App Interfaces
section2.content: Creating clear and intuitive mobile interfaces for a better user experience.

section3.title: Performance Awareness
section3.content: Learning to optimize app performance and ensure smooth functionality.

section4.title: Continuous Learning
section4.content: Exploring new Swift features and iOS developments to grow as a mobile developer.

userExperienceAndDesign.title: User Experience & Design
userExperienceAndDesign.description: I prioritize creating intuitive, responsive, and visually engaging interfaces using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. My goal is to deliver seamless user experiences that balance functionality with design clarity. With tools like Figma, Tailwind CSS, MUI, and Shadcn, I craft elegant UI systems that scale effectively across devices.

technicalInfrastructure.title: Technical Infrastructure
technicalInfrastructure.description: I build scalable, high-performance applications through modern frameworks like Next.js and Express.js. My experience spans fullstack architecture, from RESTful and GraphQL APIs to robust database systems using PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Drizzle ORM, ensuring secure and efficient data management.

securityAndDataManagement.title: Security & Data Management
securityAndDataManagement.description: Security and data integrity are at the core of every project I develop. I integrate reliable authentication flows, manage sensitive data using Supabase and PostgreSQL, and maintain 99.9% uptime through well-structured backend systems with strict TypeScript validation and error handling.

continuousIntegration.title: Continuous Integration & Development
continuousIntegration.description: I embrace CI/CD pipelines and containerization tools like Docker to automate deployments and improve system reliability. By continuously testing and optimizing code performance, I ensure that each product evolves efficiently with minimal downtime and maximum adaptability.

section1.title: User Experience and Interface Design
section1.content: Our web applications are developed with user-centered design principles and provide an intuitive navigation experience. Interfaces designed in accordance with modern UI/UX standards provide high usability as well as aesthetic appearance. While providing a consistent experience on all devices with a responsive design approach, it has been developed in accordance with accessibility standards. User flows are optimized with detailed analyses, ensuring that operations can be completed with minimum clicks. Interface components are positioned taking into account user habits.

section2.title: Technological Infrastructure and Performance Optimization
section2.content: Our applications, developed using Next.js, React, and modern web technologies, offer high performance and scalability. While server-side rendering and static generation features provide fast loading times, resource usage is optimized with lazy loading techniques. CDN integration and caching mechanisms aim for low latency on a global scale. Continuous improvements are made based on performance metrics, while Lighthouse scores are regularly monitored. Database queries and API calls are optimized to minimize server load.

section3.title: Security and Data Management
section3.content: Our web applications are developed in accordance with OWASP Top 10 security standards. End-to-end encryption, CSRF protection, XSS measures, and other security layers are implemented in data transmission. While user authorizations are managed with role-based access control (RBAC), all inputs are validated. Possible vulnerabilities are detected in advance with regular security audits and penetration tests. GDPR and KVKK compliance ensures the security and privacy of user data. Data backup and disaster recovery procedures are automated.

section4.title: Continuous Integration and Development Process
section4.content: Our development process, managed with Agile methodology, aims to quickly reflect user feedback into the product. Thanks to CI/CD pipelines, we have the flexibility to make multiple production deployments per day. While the impact of new features is measured with A/B testing mechanisms, controlled roll-out strategies are implemented with feature flags. Application health and usage statistics are monitored in real-time, and performance anomalies are reported with automatic alarms. All APIs are standardized with documentation and a developer portal. Thanks to microservice architecture, system components can be scaled independently.

section1.title: My Passion for Artificial Intelligence
section1.description: Lately, Iâ€™ve been deeply focused on artificial intelligence and machine learning. I train models using frameworks like TensorFlow and Keras, exploring different deep learning architectures. I believe AI is more than just code â€” itâ€™s a field that reshapes the way we think. I constantly experiment and try to apply what I learn to real-world problems.

section2.title: Model Training and Experiments
section2.description: I work with various datasets to build and optimize machine learning and deep learning models. My projects involve image classification, natural language processing (NLP), and time series forecasting. Beyond TensorFlow and Keras, I also use tools like scikit-learn, NumPy, and Pandas to strengthen my data analysis workflow.

section3.title: Personal Projects and Research
section3.description: Recently, Iâ€™ve been developing my own AI projects and experimenting with LLM-based (Large Language Model) systems. Iâ€™m particularly interested in fine-tuning, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and embedding techniques. My goal is to create personal solutions that make AI more accessible and genuinely useful.

section4.title: Continuous Learning and Future Goals
section4.description: Iâ€™m always exploring new things and experimenting within the field of AI. I keep up with academic papers and stay active in AI communities. In the future, I aim to train my own model from scratch and develop AI solutions that can make a real impact in areas like healthcare, finance, or education.

mainHeading.subtitle: Ideas that transform your digital presence

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: I develop native mobile applications using Swift, focusing on learning best practices and creating user-friendly apps.

web.title: Web
web.description: I create full-stack web applications using Next.js and React for the frontend, and Nest.js and Express.js for the backend. With a focus on performance, scalability, and clean code, I build solutions that are both technically robust and provide seamless user experiences.

3d.title: 3D & Interactive Design
3d.description: I create interactive 3D experiences using React-based 3D libraries. By combining my creativity and technical skills, I build custom 3D components and visualizations that enhance user engagement and bring digital projects to life.

intelligentAgentIntegration.title: Intelligent AI Agent Integration
intelligentAgentIntegration.description: AI agents integrated into your applications take user experience to next-generation levels. Our NLP (Natural Language Processing) and machine learning-based agents instantly analyze user interactions to generate personalized responses. With our multi-agent systems, we automate complex workflows and provide real-time decision support systems. Your agents continuously learn from your data sources, improving themselves and bringing intelligent optimizations to your business processes.

customModelsAndFinetuning.title: Custom AI Models and Fine-tuning
customModelsAndFinetuning.description: We develop AI models fine-tuned specifically for your industry. By training your LLMs (Large Language Models) with your own data, we transfer your company's knowledge base to your digital assistants. We create intelligent chatbots that provide real-time data access through RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) architectures without hallucinations. We transform your corporate knowledge management using custom embeddings and vector databases. We continuously monitor model performance and establish automatic retraining pipelines.

autonomousProcesses.title: Autonomous Business Processes and Automation
autonomousProcesses.description: We make your routine business processes fully autonomous with our AI agents. We create digital employees that can make independent decisions in areas such as document processing, data analysis, and customer service. We optimize human-AI collaboration through workflow automation, multiplying your operational efficiency. Your agents integrate seamlessly with your existing systems via APIs while providing advanced authorization mechanisms for secure data sharing.

realtimeAnalysis.title: Real-time Analysis and Insights
realtimeAnalysis.description: We extract meaningful insights from your data with our AI-powered analytics platform. We support your proactive decision-making processes with anomaly detection, trend analysis, and forecasting models. With our multimodal AI approach, we analyze your text, audio, and image data together to provide a holistic perspective. We make complex data understandable with customizable dashboards and automated reporting tools. Your agents instantly detect critical changes and send notifications to relevant teams.

ai.title: AI
ai.description: My interest in artificial intelligence began with a curiosity to understand how systems learn and think. Now, I train my own models with TensorFlow and Keras, experimenting and learning a little more every day.

subAi.title: Every project that starts with a small idea can lead to a big transformation with the right effort.
subAi.subtitle: I started my career as a full-stack developer. While building projects with Next.js and Nest.js, I became fascinated by the idea that systems can not only function but also learn. Now, I focus on combining web technologies with machine learning to create projects that make a real-world impact.
subAi.desc1: Machine learning and deep learning models (TensorFlow, Keras, scikit-learn), Data analysis and model optimization, Full-stack applications with Next.js & Nest.js. Computer vision and agricultural AI projects
subAi.headline2description: In this project, I collect image data of various plant leaves to train a model capable of detecting plant diseases. The goal is to support farmers with an AI-powered tool that enables early detection and improves crop yield.
subAi.desc3: Identify potential customers, offer product recommendations, and manage sales processes on autopilot. Our chatbots direct qualified leads straight to you.
subAi.desc4: My next goal is to develop an AI system that can detect harmful insects in agricultural environments. Using image classification and object detection techniques, I aim to contribute to sustainable agriculture.
subAi.desc5: I see AI not just as technology but as a mindset that transforms how we learn and create. For me, coding is most meaningful when it involves experimenting, learning, and building something valuable in the process.

Web.title: Ideas Beyond the Horizon
Web.description: From sleek designs to intelligent systems, we craft digital experiences powered by creativity and code. Web, mobile, and AIâ€”built to inspire.
